questions.question: Basic variable can store only one value. Such variable is known as ________.
What is an array?
options: A collection of homogeneous type of elements
A collection of different type of elements

questions.question: Array can represent ________ data.
________ type of list can be stored in 1-D array.
________ type of data can be stored in 2-D array.
What is Index position in array?
________ is false about an array.
options: Array is used to manage list of things in Java
Array creation is the process of three steps
Array object can be created using two ways
Array is used when same task is repeated

questions.question: How many steps are there to create an array?
How many ways array object can be created?
________ method is used to create an array.
options: Using new operator and defining its size
To directly initialize the value to array elements

questions.question: ________ bracket is used to declare 1-D array.
________ syntax is true to declare 1-D array.
________ is the wrong way to declare marks array.
int marks[] = new int[5], which is true?
options: Marks is the name of an array

questions.question: How many bytes are used to store integer value using int data type?

What do we give in the [] after the array name?
What is index or subscript?
Index value starts with ________.
What does marks[2] indicate?
What will be the value of marks[3] in {90,60,70,65,80}?
What does marks[0] indicate?
Elements in 1-D array are separated using ________.
________ syntax is not true for declaring marks array.
If we initialize values directly then which operator is not needed?
________ class method is used to display the value of array elements.
________ class method is given when array is used in Java.
What cannot be given simultaneously while declaring the array in Java?
options: Array name and size of dimension
Size of dimension and initial values
Array name and number of elements
